title: Drivers
description: All the endpoints related to the drivers.

endpoints.title: drivers
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about a all the drivers in the database. The active and the old drivers.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

endpoints.title: [driverId]
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about a driver in the database. Based on the provided driverId.
